features: Effortless movement: With plenty of stretch(Advanced Skin Dry 4-way stretch fabric)and an active fit, this best-selling Salomon ski pant follows all your movements
Weather protection: The 20k/20k fabric(DWR 80/10HL)keeps the elements out, while also being extremely breathable
Breathable warmth: Made from recycled materials, PrimaLoft® Black Eco 60g insulation offers you all the lightweight warmth and comfort you need
